show_name: Bungaku Shōjo Memoir I - Yume-Miru Shōjo no Prelude (OAV)
other_title: "文学少女"メモワール I -夢見る少女の前奏曲（プレリュード）- (Japanese)
Literature Girl Memoir I - Prelude of a Dreaming Girl
plot: Tōko Amano is a high school student with the strange power of being able to experience books by eating them. While visiting the workplace of her deceased father, she stumbles upon the rejected drafts for a writing contest. One of them has such an impact on her that she asks her acquaintance there to give it one more chance.
